name: Football Manager 2019: The Hashtag United Challenge
description: Take the Hashtag United Challenge, a FREE single-season test of your managerial mastery. Play either with or against Hashtag in the Thurlow Nunn Eastern Senior League (South) as they embark on Chapter 2 – their debut season in the English football pyramid.
minimum_requirements: Mínimo: SO: Windows 7 (SP1), 8/8.1, 10 (1803/April 2018 Update) – 64-bit or 32-bit Procesador: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon – 2.2 GHz + Memoria: 2 GB de RAM Gráficos: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 – 256MB VRAM DirectX: Versión 9.0 Almacenamiento: 7 GB de espacio disponible
